Table: file

Files are distinct downloadable entities which may be associated with publications.

file Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
file character varying UNIQUE NOT NULL

The URI for this file (relative to /assets/ or to the location)
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT nextval('file_id_seq'::regclass)

A globally unique identifier for this file (a UUID).
thumbnail character varying

The location of a thumbnail version of this file (relative to /assets/)
mime_type character varying NOT NULL

The MIME Type (RFC 2046).
sha1 character varying

A SHA1 hash of the contents of this file.
size integer

The number of bytes in the file.
location character varying

The host for this file, if it is outside of GCIS.
landing_page character varying

A URL for the landing page for this file.

 

file Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_file_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

publication_file_map
